trans-unit.source: The permission that is demanded by <xref href="System.Transactions"></xref> when management of a transaction is escalated to MSDTC.
trans-unit.target: 所要求的使用權限<xref href="System.Transactions"></xref>時將交易的管理擴大至 MSDTC。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: A local transaction only consumes resources from a single durable source or mutilple volatitle sources.
trans-unit.target: 本機交易只會消耗資源，從持久的單一來源或多個 volatitle 來源。

trans-unit.source: A distributed transaction, on the other hand, has to interact with multiple durable resources, potentially across the network.
trans-unit.target: 分散式的交易，相反地，具有互動多個長期的資源，可能在網路上。

trans-unit.source: When management of a transaction is escalated to MSDTC, the code that initiated the escalation is verified to have this permission.
trans-unit.target: 當交易的管理擴大至 MSDTC 時，啟始擴大規模的程式碼會驗證擁有此權限。

trans-unit.source: For more information on security levels, see [Security Trust Levels in Accessing Resources](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8e45acbc-0d81-4f64-9da7-8f766aebff51).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關安全性層級的詳細資訊，請參閱[中存取資源的安全性信任層級](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8e45acbc-0d81-4f64-9da7-8f766aebff51)。

trans-unit.source: For more information on transaction management escalation, see [Transaction Management Escalation](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/5b87ae58-8ccf-4b9b-9715-41e4aade89b7).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關交易的管理擴大規模的詳細資訊，請參閱[交易管理擴大](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/5b87ae58-8ccf-4b9b-9715-41e4aade89b7)。

trans-unit.source: The security demand affects the code that initiated the escalation, not necessarily the code that originally created the local transaction.
trans-unit.target: 安全性需求會影響啟始擴大規模的程式碼中，不一定是最初建立本機交易的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Transactions.DistributedTransactionPermission"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Transactions.DistributedTransactionPermission"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 建立並傳回目前權限的相同複本。

trans-unit.source: A copy of the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 一份目前的權限。

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a permission with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: 重新建構具有指定狀態的 XML 編碼方式的權限。

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding used to reconstruct the permission.
trans-unit.target: XML 編碼方式，用來重新建構權限。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 建立並傳回目前權限和指定的權限交集的權限。

trans-unit.source: A permission to intersect with the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前權限產生交集的權限。

trans-unit.source: It must be the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 它必須是相同的類型與目前權限。

trans-unit.source: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 代表目前權限與指定權限交集的新權限。

trans-unit.source: This new permission is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the intersection is empty.
trans-unit.target: 這個新權限是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果交集是空的。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出目前的權限是否為指定的權限的子集。

trans-unit.source: A permission to test for the subset relationship.
trans-unit.target: 若要測試子集關聯性的權限。

trans-unit.source: This permission must be the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 此權限必須與目前權限相同的類型。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current <xref href="System.Security.IPermission"></xref> is a subset of the specified <xref href="System.Security.IPermission"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果目前<xref href="System.Security.IPermission"></xref>是指定的子集<xref href="System.Security.IPermission"> </xref>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether unrestricted access to the resource that is protected by the current permission is allowed.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出是否允許無限制地的存取受目前的權限的資源。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if unrestricted use of the resource protected by the permission is allowed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果不受限制的受保護的資源使用會允許權限;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state.
trans-unit.target: 建立安全性物件和其目前狀態的 XML 編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.SecurityElement"></xref> that contains the XML encoding of the security object, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.SecurityElement"> </xref> ，其中包含安全性物件，包含所有狀態資訊的 XML 編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 建立權限聯集的目前的權限與指定權限。

trans-unit.source: A permission to combine with the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 與目前權限結合的權限。

trans-unit.source: It must be of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 它必須是類型的相同與目前權限。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.IPermission"></xref> that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.IPermission"> </xref> ，代表目前的權限與指定權限的聯集。
